EngageX Platform Overview EngageX is a conversational AI platform that allows businesses to build chatbots for websites, mobile applications, and WhatsApp. The platform supports both rule-based chatbots and AI-powered chatbots. AI-powered chatbots use document embeddings and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG).
Supported Channels EngageX chatbots can be deployed on: - WhatsApp - Websites - Mobile applications (Android and iOS) Each channel uses the same core conversation engine but different adapters.

WhatsApp Chatbot Features The WhatsApp chatbot supports: - Automated customer replies - Order tracking - Appointment booking - Human handover to live agents WhatsApp messages are processed through a webhook-based architecture.

Limitations If the information is not present in the knowledge base, the system should respond with: "I'm sorry, I don't have that information right now." The chatbot should never hallucinate answers that are not in the documents.
